long: Analog-hybrid distortion using premium transistors and hand-selected components for harmonic richness. Buffered bypass, true tone control, limited to 150 units per run. Hand-tested in East London.

title: Anvil Reverb
short: Compact studio reverb with spring & plate emulations for guitar recording.
long: Digital-engineered spring and plate algorithms tuned for electric guitars. Modular firmware updates, command pedal option. Limited edition finish.
